abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews documentary film Colliding Dreams, directed by Joseph Dorman and Oren Rudavsky.
lead_paragraph: This documentary covers a movement’s development over more than a century, from the pogroms that drove Jews from Europe in the 1880s to the 1995 assassination of Yitzhak Rabin.

headline.main: Review: ‘Colliding Dreams’ Explores Varying Viewpoints on Zionism
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Colliding Dreams’ Explores Varying Viewpoints on Zionism

snippet: This documentary covers a movement’s development over more than a century, from the pogroms that drove Jews from Europe in the 1880s to the 1995 assassination of Yitzhak Rabin.
